trans-unit.source: Diagnose performance issues on a running website | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Diagnose performance issues on a running website | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Monitor a website's performance without re-deploying it.
trans-unit.target: Monitor a website's performance without re-deploying it.

trans-unit.source: Use standalone or with Application Insights SDK to get dependency telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Use standalone or with Application Insights SDK to get dependency telemetry.

trans-unit.source: Install Application Insights Status Monitor to monitor website performance
trans-unit.target: Install Application Insights Status Monitor to monitor website performance

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: The Status Monitor of Visual Studio Application Insights lets you diagnose exceptions and performance issues in web applications running in any IIS server.
trans-unit.target: The Status Monitor of Visual Studio Application Insights lets you diagnose exceptions and performance issues in web applications running in any IIS server.

trans-unit.source: Just install it on your IIS web server and it will instrument the ASP.NET web apps it finds there, sending data to the Application Insights portal for you to search and analyse.
trans-unit.target: Just install it on your IIS web server and it will instrument the ASP.NET web apps it finds there, sending data to the Application Insights portal for you to search and analyse.

trans-unit.source: You can install it on any physical or virtual server to which you have admin access.
trans-unit.target: You can install it on any physical or virtual server to which you have admin access.

trans-unit.source: sample charts
trans-unit.target: sample charts

trans-unit.source: You have a choice of three ways to apply Application Insights to your IIS web applications:
trans-unit.target: You have a choice of three ways to apply Application Insights to your IIS web applications:

trans-unit.source: **Build time:** [Add the Application Insights SDK][greenbrown] to your web app code.
trans-unit.target: **Build time:** [Add the Application Insights SDK][greenbrown] to your web app code.

trans-unit.source: This gives you:
trans-unit.target: This gives you:

trans-unit.source: A range of standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.
trans-unit.target: A range of standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.

trans-unit.source: And you can use the [Application Insights API][api] if you want to write your own telemetry to track usage or diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: And you can use the [Application Insights API][api] if you want to write your own telemetry to track usage or diagnose problems.

trans-unit.source: **Run time:** Use Status Monitor to instrument your web app on the server.
trans-unit.target: **Run time:** Use Status Monitor to instrument your web app on the server.

trans-unit.source: Monitor web apps that are already running: no need to rebuild or republish them.
trans-unit.target: Monitor web apps that are already running: no need to rebuild or republish them.

trans-unit.source: A range of standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.
trans-unit.target: A range of standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.

trans-unit.source: Dependency diagnostics—locate faults or poor performance where your app uses other components such as databases, REST APIs, or other services.
trans-unit.target: Dependency diagnostics—locate faults or poor performance where your app uses other components such as databases, REST APIs, or other services.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot any issues with telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot any issues with telemetry.

trans-unit.source: **Both:** Compile the SDK into your web app code, and run Status Monitor on your web server.
trans-unit.target: **Both:** Compile the SDK into your web app code, and run Status Monitor on your web server.

trans-unit.source: The best of both worlds:
trans-unit.target: The best of both worlds:

trans-unit.source: Standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Standard diagnostic and usage telemetry.

trans-unit.source: Dependency diagnostics.
trans-unit.target: Dependency diagnostics.

trans-unit.source: Write custom telemetry using the API.
trans-unit.target: Write custom telemetry using the API.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot any issues with the SDK and telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot any issues with the SDK and telemetry.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] Is your app an [Azure App Service Web App](../app-service-web/websites-learning-map.md)?
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] Is your app an [Azure App Service Web App](../app-service-web/websites-learning-map.md)?

trans-unit.source: [Add the Application Insights SDK][greenbrown] and then [add the Application Insights extension](../insights-perf-analytics.md) from the app's control panel in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: [Add the Application Insights SDK][greenbrown] and then [add the Application Insights extension](../insights-perf-analytics.md) from the app's control panel in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Install Application Insights Status Monitor on your IIS web server
trans-unit.target: Install Application Insights Status Monitor on your IIS web server

trans-unit.source: You need a [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com) subscription.
trans-unit.target: You need a [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com) subscription.

trans-unit.source: On your IIS web server, login with administrator credentials.
trans-unit.target: On your IIS web server, login with administrator credentials.

trans-unit.source: Download and run the [Status Monitor installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506648).
trans-unit.target: Download and run the [Status Monitor installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506648).

trans-unit.source: In the installation wizard, sign in to Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: In the installation wizard, sign in to Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Sign into Azure with your Microsoft account credentials
trans-unit.target: Sign into Azure with your Microsoft account credentials

trans-unit.source: Pick the installed web application or website that you want to monitor, then configure the resource in which you want to see the results in the Application Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: Pick the installed web application or website that you want to monitor, then configure the resource in which you want to see the results in the Application Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: Choose an app and a resource.
trans-unit.target: Choose an app and a resource.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you choose to configure a new resource and [resource group][roles].
trans-unit.target: Normally, you choose to configure a new resource and [resource group][roles].

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use an existing resource if you already set up [web tests][availability] for your site, or [web client monitoring][client].
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, use an existing resource if you already set up [web tests][availability] for your site, or [web client monitoring][client].

trans-unit.source: Restart IIS.
trans-unit.target: Restart IIS.

trans-unit.source: Choose Restart at the top of the dialog.
trans-unit.target: Choose Restart at the top of the dialog.

trans-unit.source: Your web service will be interrupted for a short while.
trans-unit.target: Your web service will be interrupted for a short while.

trans-unit.source: Notice that ApplicationInsights.config has been inserted into the web apps that you want to monitor.
trans-unit.target: Notice that ApplicationInsights.config has been inserted into the web apps that you want to monitor.

trans-unit.source: Find the .config file alongside the code files of the web app.
trans-unit.target: Find the .config file alongside the code files of the web app.

trans-unit.source: There are also some changes to web.config.
trans-unit.target: There are also some changes to web.config.

trans-unit.source: Want to (re)configure later?
trans-unit.target: Want to (re)configure later?

trans-unit.source: After you complete the wizard, you can re-configure the agent whenever you want.
trans-unit.target: After you complete the wizard, you can re-configure the agent whenever you want.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this if you installed the agent but there was some trouble with the initial setup.
trans-unit.target: You can also use this if you installed the agent but there was some trouble with the initial setup.

trans-unit.source: Click the Application Insights icon on the task bar
trans-unit.target: Click the Application Insights icon on the task bar

trans-unit.source: View performance telemetry
trans-unit.target: View performance telemetry

trans-unit.source: Sign into [the Azure Preview portal](http://portal.azure.com), browse Application Insights and open the resource that you created.
trans-unit.target: Sign into [the Azure Preview portal](http://portal.azure.com), browse Application Insights and open the resource that you created.

trans-unit.source: Choose Browse, Application Insights, then select your app
trans-unit.target: Choose Browse, Application Insights, then select your app

trans-unit.source: Open the Performance blade to see dependency and other data.
trans-unit.target: Open the Performance blade to see dependency and other data.

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: Performance

trans-unit.source: Click through any chart to see more details.
trans-unit.target: Click through any chart to see more details.

trans-unit.source: Dependencies
trans-unit.target: Dependencies

trans-unit.source: The charts labeled HTTP, SQL, AZUREBLOB show the response times and counts of calls to dependencies: that is, external services that your application uses.
trans-unit.target: The charts labeled HTTP, SQL, AZUREBLOB show the response times and counts of calls to dependencies: that is, external services that your application uses.

trans-unit.source: Performance counters
trans-unit.target: Performance counters

trans-unit.source: Click any performance counter chart to change what it shows.
trans-unit.target: Click any performance counter chart to change what it shows.

trans-unit.source: Or you can add a new chart.
trans-unit.target: Or you can add a new chart.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions
trans-unit.target: Exceptions

trans-unit.source: Click through the server exceptions chart
trans-unit.target: Click through the server exceptions chart

trans-unit.source: You can drill down to specific exceptions (from the last seven days) and get stack traces and context data.
trans-unit.target: You can drill down to specific exceptions (from the last seven days) and get stack traces and context data.

trans-unit.source: No telemetry?
trans-unit.target: No telemetry?

trans-unit.source: Use your site, to generate some data.
trans-unit.target: Use your site, to generate some data.

trans-unit.source: Wait a few minutes to let the data arrive, then click **Refresh**.
trans-unit.target: Wait a few minutes to let the data arrive, then click **Refresh**.

trans-unit.source: Open Diagnostic Search (the Search tile) to see individual events.
trans-unit.target: Open Diagnostic Search (the Search tile) to see individual events.

trans-unit.source: Events are often visible in Diagnostic Search before aggregate data appears in the charts.
trans-unit.target: Events are often visible in Diagnostic Search before aggregate data appears in the charts.

trans-unit.source: Open Status Monitor and select your application on left pane.
trans-unit.target: Open Status Monitor and select your application on left pane.

trans-unit.source: Check if there are any diagnostics messages for this application in the "Configuration notifications" section:
trans-unit.target: Check if there are any diagnostics messages for this application in the "Configuration notifications" section:

trans-unit.source: Make sure your server firewall allows outgoing traffic on port 443 to dc.services.visualstudio.com.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your server firewall allows outgoing traffic on port 443 to dc.services.visualstudio.com.

trans-unit.source: On the server, if you see a message about "insufficient permissions", try the following:
trans-unit.target: On the server, if you see a message about "insufficient permissions", try the following:

trans-unit.source: In IIS Manager, select your application pool, open **Advanced Settings**, and under **Process Model** note the identity.
trans-unit.target: In IIS Manager, select your application pool, open **Advanced Settings**, and under **Process Model** note the identity.

trans-unit.source: In Computer management control panel, add this identity to the Performance Monitor Users group.
trans-unit.target: In Computer management control panel, add this identity to the Performance Monitor Users group.

trans-unit.source: See [Troubleshooting][qna].
trans-unit.target: See [Troubleshooting][qna].

trans-unit.source: System Requirements
trans-unit.target: System Requirements

trans-unit.source: OS support for Application Insights Status Monitor on Server:
trans-unit.target: OS support for Application Insights Status Monitor on Server:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Windows server 2012 R2
trans-unit.target: Windows server 2012 R2

trans-unit.source: with latest SP and .NET Framework 4.0 and 4.5
trans-unit.target: with latest SP and .NET Framework 4.0 and 4.5

trans-unit.source: On the client side Windows 7, 8 and 8.1, again with .NET Framework 4.0 and 4.5
trans-unit.target: On the client side Windows 7, 8 and 8.1, again with .NET Framework 4.0 and 4.5

trans-unit.source: IIS support is: IIS 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5
trans-unit.target: IIS support is: IIS 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5

trans-unit.source: (IIS is required)
trans-unit.target: (IIS is required)

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: [Create web tests][availability] to make sure your site stays live.
trans-unit.target: [Create web tests][availability] to make sure your site stays live.

trans-unit.source: [Search events and logs][diagnostic] to help diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: [Search events and logs][diagnostic] to help diagnose problems.

trans-unit.source: [Add web client telemetry][usage] to see exceptions from web page code and to let you insert trace calls.
trans-unit.target: [Add web client telemetry][usage] to see exceptions from web page code and to let you insert trace calls.

trans-unit.source: [Add Application Insights SDK to your web service code][greenbrown] so that you can insert trace and log calls in the server code.
trans-unit.target: [Add Application Insights SDK to your web service code][greenbrown] so that you can insert trace and log calls in the server code.

trans-unit.source: Video
trans-unit.target: Video

trans-unit.source: Performance monitoring
trans-unit.target: Performance monitoring

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
